casebody.data:
HUDSON COUNTY BUS OWNERS’ ASSOCIATION ET AL. v. BOARD OF PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSIONERS ET AL. Submitted October term, 1928 Decided January 3, 1929.

Before Justices Mintuen, Black and Campbell.

Por the rule, Barison & Barison. Contra, William H. Speer and John W. Queen. Pee Cdeiam.

We have reached the conclusion that the writ applied for should not he allowed.

The rule to show cause is therefore discharged.
